author: David Schutzman
title: Top Tier Consulting (T2C) Named in Top 30 Management Consulting Firms by Modern Healthcare Magazine
text:
Top Tier Consulting (T2C), a premier healthcare management consulting firm providing exceptional service to major healthcare organizations, was named to the Top 30 list of Management Consulting Firms by Modern Healthcare magazine. The rankings appear in the August 24 issue of the highly regarded publication, the leading healthcare industry source received by 91 percent of all C-level hospital executives. “We’re quite honored to be recognized for the work that we do in improving health care access and delivering innovative approaches to practitioners, and to the institutions where their work matters most,” said Brad Armstrong, Senior Partner at T2C. “We created T2C to be a client-focused consultancy, and we’re passionate about creating both inspiration and opportunity for those clients in the collaborative environment that is the foundation of Top Tier.”
The T2C firm previously has been named by Consulting Magazine as a "2015 Seven Small Jewels" recipient, an award reserved for consultancies seeing rapid growth that dramatically outperforms their peers. The company also made the new list of the LA Business Journal’s Best Places to Work in Los Angeles, and is one of the Top 5 firms in the small business category. The LA award reflects T2C’s commitment to mentoring, career opportunity and work-life balance.
"This is the second year in a row we have been featured in Modern Healthcare's list of top consulting firms," said Gregory Anderson, Senior Partner at T2C. "This recognition underscores the close personal attention we give all of our clients, our thought leadership in the healthcare industry and the fact that major healthcare organizations trust us to drive positive results and provide new direction as the industry continues its rapid change." With this new award, T2C gains recognition that broadens what its existing clients already know about their professionalism, and what the staff has long known about their corporate culture.
“We have impressive provider contracts, and significant revenue growth measured by Modern Healthcare, and we’re delighted by the award that reflects that growth,” Armstrong said. “But the reason for that success is our people, and the emphasis we place on quality in community.”
Information about the Modern Healthcare award is available on the magazine website.
About Top Tier Consulting
Top Tier Consulting is a premier healthcare management consulting firm that provides world class consulting for major healthcare organizations. T2C's mission is to help healthcare organizations and the people they serve, and to identify real opportunities for maximizing revenue and improving patient care. Using a fact-based approach, T2C helps resolve the most critical and complex issues facing the healthcare industry today, and designs and executes a strategy for responding to those challenges. For more information, visit http://www.t2c.com .
